name: sm_posts_connector
description: Example Data Studio connector for the SM posts API
author: James Elderfield <james.elderfield@supermetrics.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist && webpack && cpx appsscript.json dist
scripts.push: yarn build && clasp push && clasp push
scripts.setup: yarn clasp login && yarn clasp create --type standalone --title 'SM Posts Connector'
